data.actual_result: Emoji picker is at a random position in the client(Sometimes even outside of the viewable area).
data.expected_result: Emoji picker adjusts to the new resolution and stays above the emoji icon
data.short_description: Emoji Picker doesn't move when Discord is resized
data.steps_to_repro: - Put discord in maximized mode - Open emoji picker - Move Discord so that it isn't in maximized mode anymore
